code: protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     BonitaConfiguration configuration = new BonitaConfiguration().     setProperties(configuration, parameters).     BonitaOperation op = getCamelContext().getTypeConverter().tryConvertTo(BonitaOperation.class, remaining).     if (op == null) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid operation " + remaining).     }     configuration.setOperation(op).     return new BonitaEndpoint(uri, this, configuration). }
